籤詩版本二:
Izinyoni ezidla inyama ziphenduka ama-pengs ekwindla, zijabulele ukuhamba nokundiza
Njengoba zindiza izinkulungwane zamakhilomitha esibhakabhakeni, zonke ezinye izinyoni azikwazi
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokukhuphuka nokwehla kukaKunpeng.
Konke kuyashintsha.
解曰: UKun uguqulelwe kuPeng. Izinkulungwane zezinyoni azikwazi. Ingcosana yesinamoni. Inhlanhla nengcebo kuzokwanda.
籤詩故事一:
◇U-Han Xin uyaphatha
U-Han Xin wayengowase-Huaiyin.
Ngaleso sikhathi, iNkosi yase-Han yashisa umgwaqo wepulangwe, futhi amasosha akhe amaningi abaleka.U-Han Xin, owayephephele enkosini yase-Han, naye wabaleka.
U-Xiao Wathola futhi wamjaha u-Han Xin ebusuku.
Ngakusasa lapho iNkosi yaseHan izwa ngalokhu, yathi ngokucasuka: “Cishe ingxenye yamasosha yabaleka. Angizwanga ukuthi ubujaha abanye ondunankulu, kodwa ubujaha uHan Xin wedwa. Ngani?
U-Xiao He uthe: "Uma uMhlonishwa wakho engenanhloso yokunqoba u-Xiang Yu, khohlwa. Uma ufuna ukuncintisana noChu emhlabeni, kufanele ube no-Han Xin. " Inkosi yase-Han yabe isikhonza u-Han Xin njengojenene.
UHan Xin wabe esesiza uMbusi uGao kaHan ukuthi abuse umhlaba, wathumba inkosi yaseWei, wanqoba uZhao, wazinikela kuYan, wathumba uQi, futhi wabhubhisa uChu. Wenza izimpumelelo eziyishumi ezinkulu futhi waqala wanikezwa isihloko seNkosi yamaChu.
聖意: Inhlanhla yasekhaya, inhlanhla, inhlanhla yekwindla, inhlanhla yebhizinisi, umshado ophuzile, amashwa e-Liujia, abantu abavimba amasimu, ama-silkworms, flatness, inhlanhla yezilwane eziyisithupha, inhlanhla entwasahlobo, abantu abalahlekile, icala, impumelelo, ukufuduka, ukonga, ukulahleka kwempahla, izifo, ukuthandazela ukuthula ezintabeni nasemathuneni
